known_issues: Automated build/implementation step intermittently fails to apply validation changes when requests are not extremely explicit; user experienced repeated build failures while attempting pond name + tag validation updates.

existing_features.title: Enforce an alphanumeric-only rule for pond creation names so that new ponds can only be created with names consisting of letters (A–Z, a–z) and/or numbers (0–9), rejecting any input that includes spaces, hyphens, underscores, or any punctuation/symbol characters.

new_feature_requests.summary: Enforce alphanumeric-only validation for pond creation names (reject hyphens, spaces, underscores, punctuation; allow only letters and/or numbers)
Apply the same alphanumeric-only validation rule to tags (reject non-letters/numbers)

projectName: Step 1: Enforce alphanumeric-only validation for pond creation names
